overview: "Hello Kitty- Saves the Day" features 5 Hello Kitty animated cartoons which were originally featured in "Hello Kitty's Furry Tale Theater." 1- Peter Penguin 2- Tar-Sam of the Jungle 3- Paws of the Round Table 4- Crocodile Penguin 5- Grinder Genie and the Magic Lamp.
tagline: Journey to magical lands full of adventure as Hello Kitty and her friends save the day!
title: Hello Kitty- Saves the Day
